title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 296-2.4 - Payment of evening or weekend visitor parking fees
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 §§ 296-2.4 - Payment of evening or weekend visitor parking fees

State Regulations

All persons entering designated visitor lots or change
areas established for evening or weekend usage, who do not possess an
appropriate tag/decal authorizing parking without charge, must pay the posted
charge, prior to lot entry. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
§§
296-2.4

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
